Monument Municipal Airport  is a public airport located 1 mile (1.6 km) northwest of Monument, in Grant County, Oregon, United States.
External links
*[https://www.panoramio.com/user/2567818/tags/Monument%20Municipal%20Airport%20-%20Monument Photos of the airport] by UncleTebo
